mapper.insert: insert into rsvt values (#{rsvtNo}, #{prdDtlCd}, #{usrId}, #{mnRsvtNm}, #{phn}, #{email}, #{sumPrc}, #{payFtrPrc}, #{reqCont}, #{cmnCdRsvtStt}, #{rsvtDate}, #{cncPayNo}, #{adtCnt}, #{chdCnt}, #{bbCnt}, now(), current_user, now(), current_user)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM rsvt WHERE usr_id = #{usrId} LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: update rsvt set cmn_cd_rsvt_stt = #{cmnCdRsvtStt} where rsvt_no = #{rsvtNo}
mapper.select: select d.prd_dtl_cd, d.arl_nm, t.prd_nm, t.trv_per, p.adt_prc, p.chd_prc, p.bb_prc from trv_prd_dtl d join trv_prd t on d.prd_cd = t.prd_cd join prd_prc p on d.prd_cd = p.prd_cd where d.prd_dtl_cd = #{prdDtlCd}
